solution_line_template: She has {marbles_after_loss} marbles after this because {initial_marbles} - {marbles_lost} = <<{initial_marbles}-{marbles_lost}={marbles_after_loss}>>{marbles_after_loss}
Her friend gives her {marbles_given} marbles because {marbles_after_loss} x {double_factor} = <<{marbles_after_loss}*{double_factor}={marbles_given}>>{marbles_given}

Adding those marbles to the {marbles_after_loss} she had before, she ends up with {marbles_given} marbles + {marbles_after_loss} marbles = <<{marbles_given}+{marbles_after_loss}={final_marbles}>>{final_marbles} marbles
